casebody.data:
In the Matter of ROSENBAUM MIRROR MANUFACTURING CO., Inc., Bankrupt. Francis E. Rivers, Trustee in Bankruptcy, Appellee, Morris Rosenbaum, Appellant. No. 58. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. Nov. 16, 1936. Shepard Broad, of New York City (Irvin Husin and Bertha Rembaugh, both of New York City, of counsel), for appellant. N. William Welling, of New York City, for appellee.

Before. MANTON, AUGUSTUS N. HAND, and CHASE, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Order (11 F.Supp. 415), affirmed on the authority of Goldstein v. Johnson (C.C.A.) 3 F.(2d) 228, and In re Rose Shoe Mfg. Co. (C.C.A.) 168 F. 39.
